name: Soul Keeper (André Servidoni)
description:
Welcome to Soul Keeper!

If you like retro-arcade games, you are in the right place :D This game was developed taking in consideration the old arcades, with screens and simple controls and a ranking system.

This game was developed in 3 days for the ScoreSpace Jam #20 with theme ABSORB. Download and play with your friends too to see who can beat the high score!
:D

PS: Was not able to upload a web version because of PostProcessing using HDR for the arcade looks like.

Story

The world is facing big challenges, wars, hate, etc. So many good souls have been lost :( 
You will be a "Soul Ranger",  and will have the task to clean and absorb all good souls to avoid they being consumed by the underworld lord!

How many souls can you save?

Controls

- Arrows or WASD: Move the character
- N: Attack with energy shots.
- M: Absorb Souls.
- SPACE: Launch Special Attack.
- ESC: Pause game.

Engine: Unity
Status: Released
Release date: 14th August 2022
